origin.medievalorigins.moon_elf.name: Moon Elf
origin.medievalorigins.moon_elf.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Dagger Damage
+ Dextrous, Stealthy§rr
§o§c- Defense§r
Mysterious, ethereal beings not of this world. Moon elves are named not for their homeland, but for the only thing their victims can see before their end.
origin.medievalorigins.pixie.name: Pixie
origin.medievalorigins.pixie.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Unique Flight, Odd§r
§o§6• Tiny: 56cm/1'10" §r
§o§c- Defense, Reputation §r
Often considered harbingers of good fortune, but also tricky, untrustworthy agents of mischief. Pixies are whimsical and very, very small.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/crazed.de: During the day they are filled with energy, giving them a speed boost.
origin.medievalorigins.goblin.descriptio:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Gold Gear Bonuses§r
§o§2+ Luck, Speed§r 
§o§6• Short: 131cm/4'3"§r 
§o§c- Health, Defense§r
§lGoblins§r are obsessed with gold and treasure and tend to find a little more loot wherever they look, but their small size leaves them vulnerable in combat.
origin.medievalorigins.fae.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Flight, Magic§r
§o§6• Short: 131cm/4'3"§r
§o§c- Loved by Mobs§r
§o§c- Defense§r
§lFae§r are short magical winged humanoids, regarded as spirits of nature and said to haunt forests and lead travelers' astray. They are equal parts mystic and trickster.
origin.medievalorigins.arachnae.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Poison, Crowd Control
+ Wall Climbing§r
§o§c- Hunger, Armor§r
A grotesque amalgamation of spider and human, with venomous fangs and bristled feet yet the ability to walk upright and wield weaponry.
origin.medievalorigins.alfiq.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Unarmed Bonus§r
§o§2+ Unique Movement§r
§o§c- Defense§r
§lAlfiq§r are a cunning species of anthropomorphic felines with sharp claws and excellent agility. Their roads often lead to warm sands.
origin.medievalorigins.wood_elf.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Ranged Bonuses, Speed§r
§o§2+ Nature magic§r
§o§6• Stealthy§r
§o§c- Melee Damage, Defense§r
§lWood Elves§r are a wise, long-lived race who live in harmony with the Earth. They are quick with a sword and bow and can outwit their enemies while among the trees.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/on_your_feet: You take less falling damage than ususal. If you would take 10 damage normally, the Alfiq would be immune. If you would take more than 10 damage normall, the Alfiq will take only a fraction of it.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/petrified.d: Gorgons were doomed to stay bound in dark caves and old dungeons. Being outside in daylight causes them to slightly petrified until night, enduring various debuffs. Can be negated by wearing a helmet. These debuffs turn into buffs after the sun fades.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/hydrophobia: Gorgons can not tolerate the purity of water and slowly take damage from it.
origin.medievalorigins.troll.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Axe Bonuses, Very tanky§r
§o§6• Large: 398cm/13'11"§r
Large, lumbering giants who hail from the mountains, trolls are aggressive and self sufficient - they prefer to live and fight alone.
power.medievalorigins.troll/apex_predato: Trolls are not big fans of food, however they tend to satiate their hunger by slaughtering other creatures.
origin.medievalorigins.ogre.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Axe Bonuses, Defense §r
§o§6• Massive: 268cm/9'5"§r
§o§c- Hunger, Speed §r
§lOgres§r are a large, short-tempered, and brutish subspecies of Orc. Their lumbering size and limited intelligence are made up for by their raw strength.
origin.medievalorigins.incubus.descripti:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Nether Bonuses
+ Strength, Fireball§r
§o§c- Damaged by Water§r
§o§c- Weak in Overworld§r
§o§c- Very Weak in high altitude and space§r
§o§c- Slightly Weak under the world
§lIncubi§r are evil servants of a dark power. They are powerful in their own realm, but in exchange for this they have given up their soul, and are weak to pure sources.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/nature_ma: The elven magic core grants the being faster mana regeneration and more power with nature spells.
